pullrequest.title: Prevent GUI from jumping around, pixel saving, analysis submission improvements

content.raw: Oh, actually, it looks like this may have already been the behaviour, there's a comment saying "TODO: Kind of dodgy raising an exception here..." before that exception is raised. Is that just to put the queue in an error state and pause it?
content.html: Oh, actually, it looks like this may have already been the behaviour, there's a comment saying "TODO: Kind of dodgy raising an exception here..." before that exception is raised. Is that just to put the queue in an error state and pause it?
